textAfterTable: 16 Songs Biography Born: 30 July 1941 in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada Genre: Pop Years Active: '50s, '60s, '70s, '80s, '90s, '00s, '10s One of the biggest teen idols of the late '50s, Paul Anka moved to the adult sphere several years later and became a successful performer, songwriter, music businessman, and recording artist, remaining so well into the new millennium. Born in Ottawa, Ontario, in 1941 to parents of Lebanese Christian descent who owned a local restaurant, Anka proved a child prodigy, beginning his show business life at the age of 12 as an impressionist.
